other_tests.findings: There has been interval increase in the size of pancreatic cysts; the cyst in the neck now measures 24 x 30 mm (increased from 17 x 25 mm) and the cyst in the tail measures 25 x 27 mm (increased from 16 x 14 mm). Non-enhancing filling defects consistent with multiple stones were noted in the dilated main pancreatic duct.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The size of the pancreatic cysts has increased compared to the prior study.
